name: NSColorList
desc: An ordered list of color objects, identified by keys.

items.name: init(name: NSColorList.Name)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a color list, registering it under the specified name if it isn’t in use already.

items.name: init?(name: NSColorList.Name, fromFile: String?)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a color list from the specified file, registering it under the specified name if it isn’t in use already.

items.name: class var availableColorLists: [NSColorList]
items.desc: Returns an array of all color lists found in the standard color list directories.

items.name: init?(named: NSColorList.Name)
items.desc: Searches the available color lists array and returns the color list with the specified name.

items.name: var name: NSColorList.Name?
items.desc: The name of the color list.

items.name: typealias NSColorList.Name
items.desc: The name assigned to a color list.

items.name: var isEditable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the color list can be modified.

items.name: var allKeys: [NSColor.Name]
items.desc: An array of the keys by which the color objects are stored in the color list.

items.name: func color(withKey: NSColor.Name) -> NSColor?
items.desc: Returns the color object associated with the specified key.

items.name: func insertColor(NSColor, key: NSColor.Name, at: Int)
items.desc: Inserts the specified color at the specified location in the color list.

items.name: func removeColor(withKey: NSColor.Name)
items.desc: Removes the color associated with the specified key from the color list.

items.name: func setColor(NSColor, forKey: NSColor.Name)
items.desc: Associates the specified color object with the specified key.

items.name: func write(to: URL?)
items.desc: Saves the color list to the file at the specified URL.

items.name: func removeFile()
items.desc: Removes the file from which the list was created, if the file is in a standard search path and owned by the user.

items.name: class let didChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted whenever a color list changes.
